Html:
Hello, first of all let me say that you did a great work in itself with this app.
I'm really interested in F# development and I read about Storm on StackOverflow.com, in an answer to a question of mine.
Now I'd like to look at the code, in Visual Studio, and downloaded rel 1.1 - but when I try to open the solution in VS it keeps telling me that Storm.UI is under source control, and that there are errors in binding... and it refuses to load it.
I'm sure it's something I do wrong on my side, but maybe you can help with some hints?

Thanks a lot
Andrea

I think VS 2008 should give you an option to "permanently remove bindings". Â If it doesn't you can open the solution file in notepad and remove the source control bindings.

~Erik

Yes, I had to modify both th solution file and the Storm.UI project configuration file, and delete all the source control files, but now it's working.
Thanks a lot
Andrea
